item.title: 堪萨斯城酋长队球星帕特里克-马霍姆斯（Patrick Mahomes）和特拉维斯-凯尔斯（Travis Kelce）将把他们的才华从球场带到牛排馆，作为合伙人投资一家新的堪萨斯城餐厅。
item.description:
Kansas City Chiefs stars Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce are taking their talents from the stadium to the steakhouse, investing as partners in a new Kansas City restaurant. https://t.co/hvbdw9RtlN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 百思买周四宣布召回其内部品牌 Insignia 的空气炸锅和空气炸炉：

item.title: Keurig 对其广受欢迎的单份饮料进行了可持续的重新设计，在咖啡粉中加入了 "圆形 "元素。
item.description:
Keurig is putting the "round" in coffee grounds with its newly unveiled sustainable redesign of its popular single-serving beverages. https://t.co/B4Zl7MCTMa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 据印第安纳州警方称，印第安纳州伦道夫县遭遇疑似龙卷风袭击，目前已造成至少三人死亡。
item.description:
At least three people have died after a suspected tornado touched down in Randolph County, Indiana, according to Indiana State Police.https://t.co/K72dt2W4tG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 官员说，马萨诸塞州六名八年级学生因在群聊中发表 "仇恨和种族主义言论 "而面临刑事指控，据称这些言论包括威胁和模拟奴隶拍卖。
item.description:
Six Massachusetts eighth graders face criminal charges in connection with "hateful and racist comments" in a group chat that allegedly included threats and a mock slave auction, officials said. https://t.co/mnNQSrQvtM pic.twitter.com/aRx4GPr9tb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 根据伊利诺伊州彩票机构发布的消息，这位昵称为 "幸运妈妈 "的女士说，她是在起床照顾哭闹的婴儿后得知这一消息的。
item.description:
According to a release from the Illinois Lottery, the woman, nicknamed "Lucky Mom," said she learned the news after waking up to tend to her crying baby. https://t.co/U8tMvYQbpq pic.twitter.com/8iR77Q3HEh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 警方称，在纽约市一个地铁站内，一名男子在高峰时段与乘客发生肢体冲突，随后遭到枪击，伤势严重：
item.description:
A man was in critical condition after being shot during a physical altercation in a NYC subway station filled with commuters during rush hour, police said.

Video from the scene shows commuters ducking for cover during the incident.

More here: https://t.co/KJFObqt1ea pic.twitter.com/5ZnKu4imSu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 南达科他州州长克里斯蒂.诺姆（Kristi Noem）在社交媒体上发布视频，宣传她在得克萨斯州一家牙科诊所接受的牙科治疗后，正面临着严格的审查，一家非营利组织在诉讼中声称她肯定与牙医有秘密的 "经济关系"。
item.description:
South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem is facing scrutiny after posting video on social media promoting dental work she received from a practice in Texas, with a nonprofit claiming in a lawsuit that she must have a secret "financial relationship" with the dentists. https://t.co/uQlqH6T0pl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）的律师周四要求新墨西哥州一名法官驳回因《锈迹斑斑》片场致命枪击案而对他提出的指控，指责检察官 "不道德地贬低亚历克-鲍德温"。
item.description:
Attorneys for Alec Baldwin asked a New Mexico judge on Thursday to dismiss the charges against him stemming from the fatal shooting on the set of "Rust," accusing prosecutors of "unethical disparagement of Alec Baldwin." https://t.co/xsyUahvwHo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 不断发展：画面显示，周四晚上，一场强龙卷风在俄亥俄州弗莱堡着陆，碎片横飞，强风暴系统正穿过中西部地区。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: Footage shows a powerful tornado touching down in Fryburg, Ohio, on Thursday night, sending debris flying, as a severe storm system made its way through the Midwest. https://t.co/osArK9Xuv4 pic.twitter.com/xJQJyZy3zO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 周四上午，一辆联邦快递半挂车在纽约皮茨福德（Pittsford）翻车，造成包括一名婴儿在内的五人受伤。
item.description:
Five people, including an infant, were injured after a FedEx semitrailer rolled over a bridge in Pittsford, New York, on Thursday morning, officials said. https://t.co/zWAhtF2V03 pic.twitter.com/kxpt52xWqT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 最新消息法官斯科特-麦卡菲（Scott McAfee）表示，他期待已久的关于取消富尔顿县地方检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）资格的裁决 "应该 "在周五出炉。
item.description:
JUST IN: Judge Scott McAfee says his long-awaited ruling on the effort to disqualify Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis "should" come out Friday. https://t.co/X1YjvFRhZH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 奥利维亚-蒙恩（Olivia Munn）透露自己正在与乳腺癌作斗争，这使一种用于帮助确定个人患病风险的工具备受关注。
item.description:
Olivia Munn's revelation that she is battling breast cancer put an important spotlight on a tool used to help determine a person's risk of the disease. https://t.co/h5TT6XrXq5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 25 岁的杰斯说，在确诊癌症后，他感到非常震惊，决定在社交媒体上记录自己的抗癌历程，以帮助人们提高对癌症的认识。
item.description:
After the shock of his diagnosis, 25-year-old Jace said he decided to document his cancer journey on social media to help raise awareness. https://t.co/oEpxhcZhH1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在周四发表的一份声明中说，他和第一夫人吉尔-拜登对奈克斯特-本尼迪克特的去世感到 "心碎"。拜登还说，本尼迪克特 "今天应该还在我们身边"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden said in a statement issued Thursday that he and first lady Jill Biden are "heartbroken" by the loss of Nex Benedict. Biden added that Benedict should "still be here with us today." https://t.co/znmopvSizx pic.twitter.com/Q2oCxx0Fd7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 警方称，在高峰时段，纽约市一个挤满乘客的地铁站内发生肢体冲突，一名男子中枪后生命垂危。

item.title: 司法部宣布，蒙大拿州一名男子承认在 "大胆计划 "中对巨型杂交绵羊进行基因工程改造并将其出售给狩猎机构。
item.description:
Montana man pleads guilty to genetically engineering giant hybrid sheep in "audacious scheme" to sell the species to hunting facilities, DOJ announces. https://t.co/hrfiMpDYKW

item.title: 一名以色列高级官员称，美国已开始放缓对以色列的部分军事援助，而美国高级官员否认了这一说法。

item.title: 最新消息：陪审团判定詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）在其子 2021 年密歇根州牛津高中校园枪击案中犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description:
BREAKING: A jury has convicted James Crumbley guilty of involuntary manslaughter over his role in his son's 2021 school shooting at Oxford High School in Michigan. https://t.co/sN3l6X5HV8 pic.twitter.com/u2kDmUCGmA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 陪审团认定詹姆斯-克兰布尔在其子校园枪击案中犯有过失杀人罪@TrevorLAult："这告诉我 我们正处在一个新的时代" "美国如何应对大规模枪击和校园枪击"
item.description:
BREAKING: The jury has found James Crumbley guilty of manslaughter over his role in his son's school shooting.@TrevorLAult: "What this tells me is that we are now in a new day in how America responds to mass shootings and school shootings." pic.twitter.com/Md6XpEAOwS

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 14, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州的一名司机被迫倒车，躲避一个意想不到的道路障碍--一只好斗的火鸡扇动着羽毛，啄向挡在它前面的汽车。
item.description:
A driver in South Carolina was forced to hit reverse and evade an unexpected road obstacle — a combative turkey fanning its feathers and pecking at the car in its path. https://t.co/cWJf37WjJ4 pic.twitter.com/02xNtagADQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 据司法部称，一名前共享单车司机因认为一名乘客是犹太人或以色列人而对其发起攻击，现已被捕。
item.description:
A former ride-share driver has been arrested after launching an attack on a passenger because he perceived the individual to be Jewish or Israeli, according to the Justice Department. https://t.co/1i77wo71yg pic.twitter.com/wzpQDEpLjq

item.title: 鸟瞰图显示，在加利福尼亚州洛杉矶市谢尔曼奥克斯（Sherman Oaks）社区，山体滑坡摧毁了一栋房屋，并损坏了另外两栋房屋。最近的暴雨很可能是造成山体滑坡的原因之一，导致一些居民撤离....。
item.description:
An aerial view shows a pool remaining above a large fissure after a landslide destroyed one home and damaged two others in the Sherman Oaks neighborhood in Los Angeles, California.Recent heavy rains likely played a role in the landslide, prompting several residents to evacuate.… pic.twitter.com/6Z2ynf2Vp0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024
